services.name: Dental implants
services.description: A long-lasting solution to replace missing teeth, dental implants restore function, appearance, and confidence with a natural-looking result.

services.name: Root Canal Treatment
services.description: A procedure that removes infection inside the tooth, relieves pain, and preserves your natural tooth whenever possible.

services.name: Routine Cleaning
services.description: Professional cleaning to remove plaque and tartar, helping prevent cavities and gum disease while keeping your smile healthy.

services.name: Denture/Partial Denture and Overdenture
services.description: Custom-made full and partial dentures designed to restore function, comfort, and confidence in your smile.

services.name: Teeth Whitening
services.description: A safe and effective treatment that brightens your smile by removing stains and discoloration caused by food, drinks, and aging.

services.name: Full mouth exam
services.description: A comprehensive examination of your teeth, gums, and oral health to detect issues early and create a personalized treatment plan.

services.name: Fillings
services.description: We restore teeth affected by cavities using durable, natural-looking materials to protect your tooth and maintain your smile.

services.name: Extractions
services.description: Safe and gentle removal of damaged or problematic teeth to relieve pain and protect your overall oral health.

services.name: Deep Cleaning (Scaling & Root Planing)
services.description: An advanced gum treatment that removes bacteria below the gum line to treat gum disease and promote healing.

services.name: Braces
services.description: Orthodontic treatment to straighten teeth, correct bite issues, and improve both oral health and appearance.

insurance: We accept most PPO dental insurance plans and Denti-Cal (Medi-Cal). Coverage varies by plan, so please call our office to verify your benefits and eligibility before your visit.
implant: Our doctors have years of experience in dental implant surgery. A consultation and exam are required.

dentists.name: Dr. Boung Y Kim
dentists.title: DDS
dentists.bio: Dr. Kim has years of experience in implant surgery with the admirable number of weekly surgeries. He focuses on patient's satisfaction, comfort, and long-term dental health.

dentists.name: Dr. Danny Do
dentists.title: DDS
dentists.bio: Dr. Do is dedicated to gentle dentistry and helps patients feel informed and confident in their care. His excellent, gentle, and patient root canal treatment procedure is favorable by many patients
